metadata.title: CVE-2024-46811 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: Fix index may exceed array range withinfpu_update_bw_bounding_box[Why]Coverity reports OVERRUN warning. soc.num_states couldbe 40. But array range of bw_params->clk_table.entries is 8.[How]Assert if soc.num_states greater than 8.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-kvm package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
